bid(uint256).details: Use the unique ID to trace the NFT so the user can make a bid on the NFT.the new bid has to be greater than the previous bid too Tip: display the value of the last bid

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256).details: This function records the details of an auction including the start and endTimeThis function is alos payable because they need to pay an auction fee to auction

bid(uint256).notice: Allows a user to make a bid on an NFT using a unique ID after making payment
